title.rendered: Medusa Equip Acquired By Medusa Group

content.rendered:
We are delighted to announce the acquisition of Medusa Equip by Medusa Group and look forward to the increased opportunities this presents for everyone connected to the business.

It is a privilege to have added a well-respected firm with such a strong international brand and presence to the Medusa Group portfolio of companies.

We are excited to help support Medusa Equip to develop into new markets, such as aerospace and defence while bringing benefits to its existing supply chain – including those operating in the oil and gas industry – through our expertise and capabilities.

We have exciting plans in place for the business and hope to be in a position to make further announcements in the near future.

Should you have any questions or wish to discuss how these changes may benefit you, please don’t hesitate to get in touch.
